DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost/timolol fixed combination (GANfort®) versus latanoprost (Xalatan®) in patients with open-angle glaucoma who have never been previously treated and are at high risk for progression.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bimatoprost/Timolol Fixed Combination Versus Latanoprost in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma Who Have Never Been Treated
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of primary openangle glaucoma that has never been treated Visual Acuity 20/60 or better in each eye Eye surgery within 3 months Any refractive eye surgery Contraindication to betaadrenoceptor antagonist therapy (eg, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [COPD], bronchial asthma, sinus bradycardia, heart block, history of severe myocardial infarction [heart attack]) Eye inflammation or eye infection within 3 months Eye trauma within 6 months Oral, injectable, or topical ophthalmic steroids within 21 days or anticipated use during study
